com.i2group.apollo.searchservice.transport
Enum FilterBasis

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<FilterBasis>
      com.i2group.apollo.searchservice.transport.FilterBasis
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<FilterBasis>
public enum FilterBasis
extends Enum<FilterBasis>

Indicates what aspect of Items will be used as the basis for a filter operation.

Since:
2.0

Enum Constant Summary
CREATED_TIMESTAMP
          The Items will be filtered according to when they were created.
MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP
          The Items will be filtered according to when they were last modified.
PROPERTY_TYPE
          The Items will be filtered according to their values for a (specified) PropertyType.
 
Method Summary
static FilterBasis valueOf(String name)
          Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
static FilterBasis[] values()
          Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
 

Enum Constant Detail

CREATED_TIMESTAMP

public static final FilterBasis CREATED_TIMESTAMP
The Items will be filtered according to when they were created.

MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP

public static final FilterBasis MODIFIED_TIMESTAMP
The Items will be filtered according to when they were last modified.

PROPERTY_TYPE

public static final FilterBasis PROPERTY_TYPE
The Items will be filtered according to their values for a (specified) PropertyType.

Note: When a FilterInfo is set to use this value, FilterInfo.setPropertyTypeId(java.lang.String) must be called to specify the PropertyType in question.
